pr_title: feat: expose subs and tenants from resource manager and azure

timeline.message: feat: expose subs and tenants from resource manager and azure

timeline.bodyText: If authenticated is available, use authenticated.tenantId() would save this variable?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to expose subscriptions() and tenants() here? The existing logic is like we make them available inside Authenticated as it above the level of resource management.
timeline.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText: Since it currently exposed in Authenticated, customer cannot use in the Azure object.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: We could expose it by save the Authenticated object, but I think use a new Client is more clear.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
